mapleai_api_endpoints.usage_instructions: Get system status and basic statistics. Requires Bearer authentication.
Get list of all available models. Requires Bearer authentication.

request_parameters.name: messages
request_parameters.description: List of messages in the conversation

mapleai_api_endpoints.usage_instructions: Generate chat completions using various AI models. Requires Bearer authentication.

request_parameters.name: n
request_parameters.description: Number of images to generate (1-10, defaults to 1)

mapleai_api_endpoints.usage_instructions: Create images from text prompts. Requires Bearer authentication.

request_body_schema.description: This endpoint expects a multipart form with multiple files

mapleai_api_endpoints.usage_instructions: Edit images using prompts and optional masks. Requires Bearer authentication. Expects multipart form data.

request_parameters.name: response_format
request_parameters.description: Audio format (mp3, opus, aac, flac; defaults to mp3)

request_body_schema.description: This endpoint expects a multipart form containing a file

mapleai_api_endpoints.usage_instructions: Translate audio files to English text. Requires Bearer authentication. Expects multipart form data.

Download completed video file. Requires Bearer authentication.
Create a variation of an existing video. Requires Bearer authentication.

request_parameters.name: input
request_parameters.description: Input text or array of texts

request_parameters.name: encoding_format
request_parameters.description: Encoding format (float or base64, defaults to float)
